attributes.action: Scrap the Council Tax Intrusion into our Homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not want the Government to be allowed to enter our homes to make an evaluation of the property, whether we have a new kitchen, or a conservatory or where we live, or if we have a 'nice outlook' to be used as a grading as a 'Tax Band' for Local Government Council tax charges. This is an intrusion on our privacy and our right to the statement an 'English Man's home is his Castle'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
